tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    satisfaction_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_feedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  satisfaction_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE appointment_feedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  satisfaction_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id INT,
  question_id INT,
  answer_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE satisfaction_survey (
  survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  question_1 VARCHAR(100),
  question_2 VARCHAR(100),
  question_3 VARCHAR(100),
  survey_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES patient_feedback(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_details (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    survey_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    email TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
    doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name TEXT,
    specialization TEXT,
    experience_years INT,
    contact_number TEXT
);
